comment: Took his online summer class for CRJU 1101. Very straightforward class. Assignments were simple and so was the grading. He responded quickly to emails as well. Few assignments, which I appreciated during the summer. Would take him again if I could.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things

comment: Took him as CRJU 1101. His class is easy; however, it moves fast. The test was open-notes, which are extremely helpful. no lockdown + webcam. Would take him again by any chance.
Very easy class, but it can be boring. 1 Mid term and 1 Final, 3 Discussion Posts. Attendance is taken, but I don't think it's mandatory.

It was a very straight forward class. Lots of lectures, were pretty boring. 2 papers, one is the final. One test the midterm. A few discussion posts but everything was pretty easy. He's very nice, caring, but has an accent not terrible though. I'd definitely take him again.
